code:
import sys
sys.setrecursionlimit(10**7)

n = int(input())
ab = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(n-1)]
k = int(input())
vp = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(k)]

tree = [[] for _ in range(n)]
for a, b in ab:
	tree[a-1].append(b-1)
	tree[b-1].append(a-1)

ans = [0]*n

def dfs(v, p):
	nonlocal ans
	for nv in tree[v]:
		if ans[nv] == 0:
			ans[nv] = p
			dfs(nv, p)

dfs(0, -1)

if ans[0] == 0:
	print("No")
else:
	print("Yes")
	for v in ans:
		print(v)
